MISSING_AMOUNT: You must write the number of bonus invites you want to add. (Syntax: {{prefix}}addbonus number @member)
INVALID_AMOUNT: You must write a __**valid**__ number of bonus invites that you want to add. (Syntax: {{prefix}}addbonus number @member)
MISSING_MEMBER: You must mention the member to whom you want to add the bonus invites. (Syntax: {{prefix}}addbonus number @member)
SUCCESS_CONTENT: Write `{{prefix}}invites {{usertag}}` to see the new number of invites of **{{username}}**!
